question.title: Question
question.description: When prescribing orthoses, what is the primary consideration for selecting a device?

option_a.title: Option A
option_a.description: The patient's age and medical history

option_b.title: Option B
option_b.description: The severity of the condition being treated

option_c.title: Option C
option_c.description: The patient's lifestyle and daily activities

option_d.title: Option D
option_d.description: The cost of the device and insurance coverage
